It shows my current thread group, samplers & Result tree

My thread group has following structure:

Thread Group
 - Sampler1
 - Sampler2
 - Sampler3
 - Sampler4
 - Sampler5

It currently works like this (with Start next loop option checked in thread):

 - Sampler1 [pass]
 - Sampler2 [pass]
 - Sampler3 [in a While Controller & fails]
 - Sampler1 [runs again]
 - Sampler2 [runs again and stops]

It does not go to Sampler3, I want it to go through all samplers if 1 of the samplers fails.

I am not sure if its a bug or i am missing any configuration?

Hi
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please ask on user mailing list.

Your issue here is that you need to select "Continue" on Thread Group instead of "Start Next Thread loop"
